title: Theodore Roosevelt Inaugural National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Operating Hours & Seasons             Operating Hours & Seasons      Operating Hours & Seasons  Open year round. Museum visit is by guided tour only.  Reservations may be made through the Theodore Roosevelt Inaugural Site Foundation.   Tours scheduled every hour at the bottom of the hour, beginning at 9:30 a.m. weekdays and12:30 p.m. weekends.  Last tour at 3:30 p.m. on Sun.-Mon., Wed. -Sat.  Last tour at 7:00 pm on Tues. The visitor center/ museum shop opens at 9:00 a.m. on weekdays and 12:00 noon on weekends.  The museum shop closes at 4:45 PM.  New evening hours!  Tuesday evenings the Site is now open late, with the last tour beginning at 6:30 pm.  Daytime tours Mon.-Fri. tours at 9:30, 10:30, 11:30, 12:30, 1:30, 2:30, 3:30.Tuesday extra evening tours at 4:30, 5:30, 6:30.Sat.-Sun. tours at 12:30, 1:30, 2:30, 3:30. Each tour is limited to 12 people and lasts approximately 30-45 minutes. Latecomers will be asked to join a later tour. Those who miss the 3:30 p.m. tour will need to return the following day. Please note that space is limited and this schedule may be altered due to scheduled groups.  Please call on the day of your tour (716-884-0095) to verify the normal tour schedule is in effect. Groups of 10 or more must make a reservation for a group tour. Please call 716-884-0095  to confirm a group tour reservation.  A two-week advance notice is necessary. Voice mail messages cannot be used for confirmation. For groups under ten, no reservations are required.  Call 716-884-0095 for information or questions. Closed on New Year's Eve, New Year's Day, Easter Sunday, Memorial Day, Independence Day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas Eve and Christmas Day.
